channel.title: Debian now has a Fediverse Packaging Team
channel.description:
Debian now has a [Fediverse Team](https://wiki.debian.org/FediverseTeam) which focuses on packagin Fediverse software for Debian.
This happens together with Debian launching its own [Social Team](https://wiki.debian.org/Teams/DebianSocial) and launching own instances of Pleroma, Peertube, WriteFreely and Pixelfed for project members.
*I am neither affiliated with Debian nor one of the mentioned teams, but just found these news relevant.*

item.title: Debian now has a Fediverse Packaging Team
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
